S01n191:4: yaḥ śrīmān sasurāsurairaviratam pādāravindārcitaḥ sākṣāt puṇyanidhānamaṅgalaguruścintāmaṇiḥ sarvavit |
S01n191:5: niḥśeṣoddhṛtadoṣajālajaṭilaḥ śauddhodaniḥ pāragaḥ pāyād vo bhagavān munīśvarajino dedīpyamānadyutiḥ ||
S01n191:7: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapo jānanneva parārthaṃ bhagavantam evam āha |
S01n191:10: kārttikakṛṣṇapratipadam ārabhya triṃśad divaseṣu yad ahorātraṃ tatra saṃghasya kaṭhinamutpadyate |
S01n191:12: kṛtakalpadarśārañjanā nīlasūtrasūcīśāstrakalpena tad dānapatayaḥ saṃnipatite saṃghe niḥsārāpayitavyāḥ |
S01n191:13: karmakārekeṇa bikṣuṇā tato dānapatayo dānaparikarmakathāyā pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ |
S01n191:16: ṣaḍhe śrāvaṇe vā māse savinayam upagamya kalpikakārakasya mukhenāryasaṃghasya vijñaptiḥ karaṇīyā tena caivaṃ karaṇīyā |
S01n191:19: so'pi tadā yadi dānapaterāśayo visśuddhaḥ suviśuddhañca deyavastu syāt tadā tūṣṇībhāvena svīkuryān no cennivarayet |
S01n191:20: yadi tadādhivāsayatyāryasaṃghastadā supramāṇāṃ surūpāṃ yugalīṃ rañjayitvā'sya darśayet |
S01n191:21: tataḥ kalpikakārakastam ādāya dānapatiṃ visṛjya hastena māpayitvānayā kaṭhina-cīvaraṃ kariṣyati |
S01n191:23: dvividhaṃ hi kaṭhinaṃ cīvaraṃ kṛtam akṛtakañca |
S01n191:24: tatra nikāyabhedena trikhaṇḍa-pañca-khaṇḍādikaṃ pariṇāhenānyūna trihastam āyāmenānyūna pañcahastaṃ susīvitaṃ kṛtakaṃ |
S01n191:26: tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ dvividhaṃ niṣṭhitam aniṣṭhitañca |
S01n191:31: siddhaṃ kaṭhinacīvaraṃ ādāyādhiṣṭhitatraimāsasyāryasaṃghasya purastād evaṃ vadet |
S01n191:32: samanvāharāryyānena civareṇāsmiṃ saṃghāvāse'mūkanāma dānapatiḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyati |
S01n191:34: evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tadanvāryasaṃgho'pi tad adhyeṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya divā[ |||| ]
S01n191:35: vā masīdravādinā nīlarāgarasena vā prānte caturbindūṃścatu-satyādi viśuddhyā datvā trīn vā triratnādi visśuddhyā dvau vā yoga-saṃbhārādi viśuddhyā yathā vidhānam abhi[ |||| ]
S01n191:40: prabhātāyan tu nisāyāṃ parikalpitesūpasṛṣṭe samucchritātapatra-dhvaja-patākā digvidig vinyasta-khaṇḍa-piṇḍa-dhūpa-ghaṭikojjvala-yaṣṭi-pradīpa-sugandhagandhādi-divyasurabhi-kusumāvakīrṇṇe pradeśe khaṭvāyām mañcāyām vā pṛthupīṭhake mantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ pañcbhirupahārairabhyarcittaṃ kaṭhinacīvaraṃ prasārya pratiṣṭhāpayet |
S01n191:41: tad anu tacchrāddho dānapatirudārābhiḥ pūjābhirabhipūjyābhipraṇamya suvarṇṇa-rajata-tāmrādi-dhātu dravyaṃ marakata-padmarāga-vajra-vaidūryyendranīlādikaṃ ratnaṃ divyāmbarābharaṇādikaṃ ca tasmin kaṭhinacīvare ratnatrayāya dadyāt ||
S01n191:43: kṣetraṃ vādikā ghārāmopavanādikaṃ dāsī-dāsa-hastyaśca go-mahiṣyādikaṃ piṇḍakādi-pratyāyañca bahirddhanantāḍapatrādau tan nāmākam vilikhya tatraiva prayacchet |
S01n191:44: bhakṣya-bhojya-lehya-peyādikaṃ bhājanādīni pañcopakaraṇa-bhāṇḍāni śayanāsanādīni bhaiṣajyānyupakaraṇāni cānekānyupabhogārhāṇi vastūni kaṭhinaṃ saṃspṛśya tat pārśvavataḥ saṃghopabhogāya viśrāṇayet |
S01n191:47: bhagavan kena kāraṇena cīvarādikaṃ kaṭhinam ityucyate |
S01n191:49: āyuṣman dṛḍhaṃ viśuddham abhedyaṃ vipulāvināśi ca kaṭhinam ityucyate |
S01n191:50: tathā hi dānapaterāśayasya dṛḍhatvāccivarasya viśuddhatvāt saṃghasyābhedyātvād dānasya phalasya ca vipulāvināśitvācca sarvameva katḥinaṃ bhavati ||
S01n191:55: śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme śubhe surabhidhūpadhūpite sugandhipuṣpakrakaropaśobhite śuciparisare mahārham mahadāsanamāsinaṃ viśuddhabodhiṃ vidhvastasamastadoṣaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śākyamunīndraṃ mahatpariṣadgaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma |
S01n191:56: atha bhagavān tūṣṇībhāvenāvasthitaḥ san sattvārthaṃ prati daśavidhabuddhakṛtyakaraṇāya laukikaṃ cittam |
S01n191:57: tataḥ tīrthikaparivrājakacoditāyāstathāgataṃ prati duṣkṛtaṃ karma saṃsmṛtya saṃjātasaṃvegāḥ sthavira-sthavirā bhikṣavaḥ śirasi vinihitāñjalayo mahadāsanāsīnaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam praṇipatyedam abrūvan |
S01n191:58: kṛtā bhagavatānekā dharmādhikārikī kathā vyākṛtāścāneke sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S01n191:59: anyaccānekam buddha-kṛtyaṃ kṛtam asmābhirapi prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditam aneke ca samyaksambuddhāḥ paryupāsitāḥ |
S01n191:60: yannu vayam anavataptaṃ saro gatvā bhagavataḥ purastāt svakasvakāṃ karmoplotiṃ vyākurmaḥ |
S01n191:62: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ daśāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti ||
S01n191:66: yāvad anekena sattvenānuttarāyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati |
S01n191:71: yavanna śrāvastyām mahānagaryāṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
S01n191:72: yaāvanna śāṃkāśye nagare devāvatāraṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
S01n191:74: yāvadanavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikā karmaplotiḥ śrāvakasaṅghena sārdhaṃ na vyākṛtā bhavatīti |
S01n191:75: atha bhagavatā manasi kṛtvā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ vyākṛtā bhavatīti |
S01n191:76: bhagavān pūrvikāṃ karmaplotim anavatapte vyākartukāmo bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma |
S01n191:77: śrutvā taduktaṃ vacanaṃ maharṣerājñāṃ gṛhītvā sugatasya śiṣyāḥ |
S01n191:78: ṛddhyā tataste yayuragrapudgalā haṃsādhipaṃ vyomni yathaiva haṃsāḥ ||
S01n191:80: visphuradvicitramaricijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhirarhaccataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto garutmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihāran niragāt |
S01n191:82: atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgro'navatante mahāsarasi pratyasthāt |
S01n191:89: gaṅgā ca sindhuśca nadaśca vakṣuḥ śītā ca yānnaiva taranti martyāḥ |
S01n191:90: anyatra yo (!) ṛddhibalasya lābhī hanteha gacchāmi saro mahodadhim ||
S01n191:98: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti tasmin samaye'ntaśaḥ kunta-pipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittam ājānanti |
S01n191:99: tato nandopanandau nāgarājau saṃlakṣayato'smin sarasi sāśrāvakasaṃgho bhagavān pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāma iti buddhādhiṣṭhānena viditvā tābhyām mahāsaraso madhye śakaṭacakrapramāṇam sahasradalaṃ vilasanmaṇinālakaṃ suhīrakakesaraṃ jvalatsarojarājakarṇikam akekapaṅkajaparivṛtam bhagavadāsanārthaṃ sauvarṇasaroruhaṃ vinirmitaṃ tatastasyāṃ karṇikāyām bhagavān niṣasāda bhikṣavo'pi bhagavato'bhimukham anyāsu kamalakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ |
S01n191:100: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmāñchāriputro gṛdhrakūṭe parvate saṃghāṭīṃ sīvayamānastiṣṭhati |
S01n191:103: evam bhagavannityāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato vacanam pratiśrutyānavatapte mahāsarasyantarhitaḥ |
S01n191:104: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthād āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purastād evaṃ cāha |
S01n191:105: he śāriputra śāstā ta ekonaiḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdham anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmastvām udīkṣaṇaparastiṣṭhati |
S01n191:108: āyuśman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi |
S01n191:109: tato maudgalyāyanena tad vacanam amṛṣyamāṇena ṛdhyā pañcāṅgulayo'sya nibaddhāḥ |
S01n191:113: āyuṣmañchāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ (!) |
S01n191:118: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svarddhyā pañcabhiraṅgulibhiḥ sīvayituṃ ārabdhaḥ |
S01n191:125: tvaṃ hyāyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavata ṛddhimatāṃ madhye'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ |
S01n191:126: idaṃ tāvat prāgeva māṃ balena nayiṣyasi |
S01n191:139: yadā saṃkṣubdhā bhavanti tadā bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti |
S01n191:147: tena yasyāṃ padmakarṇikkāyāṃ bhagavān niṣaṇṇastasyāṃ padmanāla upanibaddhaḥ |
S01n191:153: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyanaiko'hamapyāgacchāmi yāvad āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano na gacchati |
S01n191:154: tadāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ prathamataraṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā svāsanapadmakarṇikayāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ |
S01n191:155: tataḥ paścād āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āgataḥ svāsane ca vyavasthitaḥ |
S01n191:159: āgato'ham iti tataḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti |
S01n191:160: paśya bhadanta bhagavantāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano maharddhiko mahānubhāva ṛddhimatām madhye'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ |
S01n191:163: na bhikṣava etarhyeva yathātīte'pyadhvanyanena śilpenāpi parājitaḥ |
S01n191:166: sa kenacit karaṇīyena yavanaviṣayaṃ gato yantrakarācāryasya niveśane'vatīrṇastatrāhārādikaṃ kṛtvā vyavasthitaḥ |
S01n191:168: sā ca dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā tailodvartanaṃ haste nidhāya sthāpayitā |
S01n191:172: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ mama copasthānāya paricārikā preṣitā bhaviṣyatīti |
S01n191:176: dhig aho tasya janma jambudvīpe manuṣyasya yasyedṛṣī yuvatī rūpayauvanasampannā paramaramaṇīyā cakṣuṣā vā hastena vā śarīrasparśenādikaṃ na bhaved ityanenāmṛtasadṛśena mādhuryavacanena sambhāvitaḥ samāhartum ārabdhavān |
S01n191:178: tathāpi sā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā na kiṃcid uktetyavadhārya kāmopasaktacetasā satvaram upagamya |
S01n191:179: sā tena hastena gṛhitvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ |
S01n191:184: yathāsau sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedopahāsaṃ gamiṣyatīti cintayitvā tena dvārābhimukha ātmodbaddha-kaṇṭhakaścitritaḥ |
S01n191:197: yasya kasyacin niveśane'tithiḥ kālaṃ lokāntaraṃ karoti |
S01n191:198: tasya tāvat saṃskāro yāvad rājña āveditaṃ bhavati |
S01n191:200: deva madhyadeśāccitrakarācārya ihāgataḥ sa ca mama niveśane'vatīrṇastasya mayā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā paricārikā preṣitā |
S01n191:201: sā tena hastena gṛhitvāharṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ |
S01n191:203: taṃ deva pratyavekṣayatu paścād ahaṃ saṃskāraṃ kariṣyāmi |
S01n191:214: tvaṃ punarmayā sarājikāyāṃ parṣan madhye pratibhedita iti |
S01n191:216: yo'sau citrakarācārya eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ |
S01n191:217: yo'sau yantrakarācārya eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ |
S01n191:227: tato vivādād anyonyaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāvupasaṃkramya rājñaḥ sakāśe kathayato'haṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmi |
S01n191:230: bhavantau nāhaṃ jāne yo yuṣmākaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte |
S01n191:232: dvitīyo'pyaparām evaṃ tau madhye yamanikāṃ datvā citrayitumārabdhau |
S01n191:235: yena citrakarma kṛtaṃ sa rājñaḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S01n191:244: rājā tad dṛṣṭvā kathayati svacchataram idaṃ citrakarmeti |
S01n191:255: eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāno bhikṣustadāpyeṣa śilpena parājita iti |
S01n191:261: kadācid atha śaṅkhena padbhyāṃ spṛṣṭo jaṭaḥ kudhā |
S01n191:262: likhitaḥ prāha taṃ mūrdhabhedaḥ sūryodaye'stu te || 2
S01n191:264: ityukte tena suciraṃ sāndhakāram abhūj jagat || 3
S01n191:270: yāsāṃ dhyānasamāpattināṃ lābhī tathāgatastāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā nāmāpi na jānate |
S01n191:271: yāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā lābhinastāsāṃ śāriputro nāmāpi na jānīte |
S01n191:272: yāsāṃ lābhi śāriputrastāsāṃ maudgalyāyano nāmāpi na jānīte |
S01n191:273: yāsāṃ lābhī maudgalyāyanastāsāṃ tadanye śrāvakā nāmāpi na jānate |
S01n191:274: ato'yaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo'yaṃ śāriputro maudgalyāyanāt kiṃtu bahulavihāriṇāṃ saṃdhāya mayarddhimatām agrata iti nirdiṣṭaḥ |
S01n191:280: atha sthavira-sthavirā bhikṣavastathāgatājñayā svakasvakāṃ karmaplotikāṃ vyākurvanti |
S01n191:284: tato nāgilo nāma bhikṣustathāgatasyāgrato daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvā svakāṃ karmaplotikāṃ vyārocayati sma |
S01n191:330: puṣpaṃ ye sugatasya saṃghasamitau dāsyanti śraddhānvitāḥ
S01n191:333: kāyād gandhavaraṃ prayāti sukhino ghrāṇendriyaṃ śudhyati ||
S01n191:336: ye dhūpaṃ pradadanti manmatharipoḥ saṃghāya sadbhāvatas
S01n191:337: te nityaṃ sukham āpnuvanti sukhitā bhogeśvarāḥ śilinaḥ |
S01n191:338: na bhrāntasmṛtayo bhavanti vaśino dhyāneṣu labdhaspadāḥ
S01n191:339: śāntiṃ yānti manoharāḥ paṭudhiyaḥ pūjyāḥ sadevāsuraiḥ || dhūpa
S01n191:355: sā pādukāyugaladānam ṛte kutaḥ syāt || upāhana
S01n191:366: prajñā rājñī duritaharaṇe nāsti kācit tayānyā
S01n191:367: sā saṃpannā bhavati saphalā saṃpadā sarvathaiva || sūtra-sūcī
S01n191:369: khaṭikāṃ yo dadātiha jāyate paṇḍito mahān || khaṭikā
S01n191:385: na bhrājate hi bhuvi vastram ṛte manuṣyaḥ || 2
S01n191:401: hrīvastrālaṅkṛtātmā bhavati paṭumatiḥ sarvadharmeśvaraḥ saḥ || vastra
S01n191:407: na cāpi śastraṃ na tu vajravarṣam |
S01n191:411: pūjyo vandyo bhavati manujo yatra yatropapannaḥ
S01n191:416: saṃghasya bhojanaṃ dattvā sarvatra sukham edhate || bhojana
S01n191:430: pañca kāmaguṇān bhuktvā tṛṣṇāṃ chindanti śāśvatīm || kumbha
S01n191:443: yaḥ saṃghe pradadāti bhaiṣajavidhīṃstāṃstān prasannāśayaḥ sa vyādhyantarakalpasaṃbhavakṛtairduḥkhairna saṃspṛśyate |
S01n191:444: mukto vyādhijarādibhiśca sukhito jīvatyabhinnāśayaḥ kleśavyādhivivarjito hi labhate cārogyamātyantikam ||
S01n191:446: tatra saṃghe nirābādhe ca bhaiṣajyam ayācata || 1
S01n191:448: ekāṃ harītakiṃ bhuktvā tat karma samudāgamat || 2
S01n191:452: yo niryātayatīha vītarajase saṃghāya hṛdayaṃ jalam |
S01n191:454: tṛṣṇāṃ hanti na kevalaṃ vijahate saṃsāratṛṣṇām api ||
S01n191:458: na pipāsākṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ svapneṣvapi anubhūtavān || 2 || jala
S01n191:462: pāraṃ yānti bhavārṇavasya niyataṃ dattvā śubhaṃ pānakam || pānaka
S01n191:485: śuddhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān |
S01n191:487: lakṣmīrjājvalyamānā vasatu iha sadā kīrtirapyutsphurantī niḥśeṣāriḥ kṣitīśaḥ kṣitim avatu ciraṃ vyādhidurbhikṣamuktām |
S01n191:488: śīlāḍhyā dakṣiṇīyāḥ pravacananicaye vṛddhim āyāntu nityam ācandrārkaprakāśaṃ jayatu bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ niṣprakampam ||
S01n191:493: vibhāti karabhāḥ suro nabhasi yāvad uṣṇaprabhaḥ
S01n191:500: yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato'bhisaṃbuddhasya pāṣāṇa-śarkarayā pādāṅguṣṭaḥ kṣataḥ |
S01n191:503: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatairapi sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ |
S01n191:506: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
S01n191:507: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnyāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā |
S01n191:508: kālāntareṇāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt putro jātaḥ |
S01n191:510: athāpareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateḥ patnī kālagatā |
S01n191:511: tenāyā patnyānītā tasya tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
S01n191:513: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putraḥ prasūto duhitā ca jātā |
S01n191:515: sa dārakaḥ tasyaiva brātuḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhati |
S01n191:524: āryaputra nāmāsyaikasya puruṣasya bhūtvopārdham asmākaṃ prabhūtānām upārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S01n191:529: sa kathayati bhadre kathaṃ nāma svāpateyasyārthe bhrātaraṃ praghātayiṣyāmi |
S01n191:531: kāmān khalu sevamānasya nāsti kiñcit pāpakarmākaraṇīyam iti |
S01n191:537: tena tatra parvatakuhare prakṣipya pāṣāṇena praghātita iti |
S01n191:541: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena |
S01n191:542: yat tan mayā vaimātriko bhrātā svāpateyakāraṇāt praghātitaḥ |
S01n191:543: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ |
S01n191:544: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgatasyābhisambuddhasya pāṣāṇaśarkarayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ ||
S01n191:545: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato'bhisambuddhasya khadiraśalākayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ |
S01n191:547: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau nipuṇataḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇau dhanahārakau |
S01n191:554: sa tena sārthavāhena tulayā tulayitvā ratnānyapanīya sa sārthavāha ālāpitaḥ |
S01n191:559: uktaṃ ca sārthavāhena mā vahanaṃ chidraya |
S01n191:560: mā sarva evānayena vyasanam āpatsyāma iti |
S01n191:565: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat tan mayā śaktiprahāreṇa praghātitaḥ |
S01n191:566: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ |
S01n191:567: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇa tathāgatasyābhisaṃbuddhasya khadiraśalākayā vajrapādaḥ kṣataḥ ||
S01n191:568: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena sundarikāyā mānavikāyā abhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ |
S01n191:572: aśitivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma śāsta loka udapādi tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān |
S01n191:573: vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacanena dvau bhrātarau pravrajitau babhūvaturvaṣiṣṭho bharadvājaśca |
S01n191:580: tena tasya bhrātuḥ samvṛttam āgaccaikadhye vāsaṃ kalpayāmaḥ |
S01n191:581: sa tatra gataḥ tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ |
S01n191:583: sa tena prasādajātena pūjayitvā mahārheṇa ca vastreṇācchāditaḥ |
S01n191:586: sa vastreṇa chādayatyeṣa chādita iti tasyāntike'vatārapekṣī saṃvṛttaḥ |
S01n191:587: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ paryavasthitaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati yadyaham asya dāsyāmi |
S01n191:588: bhūyasyā mātrayā prasādaṃ praveśayiṣyatīti kṛtvā sa tasyaivātisṛṣṭaḥ |
S01n191:590: tasya gṛhapateḥ preṣyadārikā tasmin vihāra āgatya parikarma karoti |
S01n191:596: tvaṃ ca tad vastrayugaṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kuru |
S01n191:597: yadi gṛhatatiḥ pṛcchet kutastavaitad vastrayugam iti vaktavyam amukenāryeṇa mama dattam iti |
S01n191:599: vaktavyam āryeṇaitad api praṣṭavyaṃ kimartham puruṣāḥ stiṇām anuprayacchantīti |
S01n191:600: sā taṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kartumārabdhā |
S01n191:614: yo'sau bharadvājo nāma yena tad arhannabhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ |
S01n191:615: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat sa mayārhad bhikṣurabhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ |
S01n191:616: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni narakeṣūpapannaḥ |
S01n191:617: yāvat tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgataḥ sundarikāyā mānavikāyā abhūtenābhyākhyāta ityādi vistaraḥ |
